events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as Refund based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect item.
Customer case has been assigned to agent Maria for handling the refund request.
Hello, this is Maria. I understand you received the wrong item and Iâ€™m here to help with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received for verification?
Here is my order number 789045 and attached is a photo showing the wrong product I received instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process your full refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation.
Thanks for your prompt response and the refund process. I appreciate the quick help.
Your refund has been successfully issued. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your account.
We are checking in to ensure your refund was received and if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I have received the refund in my account. Thank you very much for resolving this quickly!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now. Feel free to contact us anytime for future needs.
